paper_abstract: We study graphs G = (V, E) containing a long cycle which for given integers a(1), a(2),..., a(k) is an element of N have an edge cut whose removal results in k components with vertex sets V(1), V(2),...,V(k) such that vertical bar V(i)vertical bar >= a(i) for 1 <= i <= k. Our results closely relate to problems and recent research in network sharing and network reliability. (C) 2008 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. NETWORKS, Vol. 52(4),252-255 2008
paper_title: Cyclic Sums, Network Sharing, and Restricted Edge Cuts in Graphs with Long Cycles
